page.title: 09INTERVIEW WITH FARMER
page.content: 1 HOW LARGE IS YOUR FARM?{300 ACRES 2 HAS YOUR FARM BEEN CHANGED BY THE GROWTH OF GLENROTHES?{YES, IT IS { NOW SLIGHTLY SMALLER AS I SOLD SOME { LAND TO THE GLENROTHES DEVELOPMENT { CORPORATION AND THERE IS NOW A ROAD { THERE. 3 HOW HAS THE MARKET FOR YOUR GOODS CHANGED SINCE THE BUILDING OF NORTH GLENROTHES? {IT HAS GROWN { CONSIDERABLY. } 4 HAVE THE GOODS YOU PRODUCE CHANGED ACCORDING TO DEMAND? {YES, WE NOW { GROW MORE WHEAT AND BARLEY AND WE { HAVE INCREASED THE AMOUNT OF CATTLE {WE KEEP. 5 WHAT CHANGES HAVE YOU NOTICED IN THE AREA AROUND YOUR FARM AND IN YOUR FARM? {THERE IS A LOT MORE { TRAFFIC AND CONSEQUENTLY MORE NOISE { WHICH USED TO ANNOY US AT FIRST BUT { WE CAN TRANSPORT OUR GOODS A (cont)
